title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
**Advertising Description:**

Transform your living space into a golden oasis with the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers! This exquisite 2-pack of pillow covers, measuring 18x18 inches, is meticulously crafted from luxurious 100% velvet fabric. The soft and comfortable texture adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to any couch, sofa bed, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or even your car.

Each cover features an invisible zipper with a longer than 35cm zipper length for easy insert compatibility with 18x18 inch or 20x20 inch inserts. These covers are not just functional but also visually stunning, making them perfect additions to your personalized home decor.

The GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers can be effortlessly machine-washed in cold water and gently dried at a low temperature for added convenience. Our dedicated customer support is always available for any suggestions or improvements, ensuring your complete satisfaction with our product.
